ygData.subject: Re: Level 12 spells
ygData.msgSnippet: ... Resistant ... useful ... nifty ... foward to. ... Identify) Fought any Evil eyes yet? When your Tank or a companions pet starts hacking into your group
ygData.messageBody:
>I would
> suggest Halo of light if you don't have >infravision/ultravision and
Resistant
> Skin if you tend to fight those diseased creatures. >Cancel Magic may be
useful
> although I've personally never used it. Otherwise keep >saving for those
nifty
> level 16 spells. There are 6 spells at that level that >I'm looking
foward to.
> (Shielding, Invis, Flame Shock, Shieldskin, Lightning >Bolt, and
Identify)

Fought any Evil eyes yet? When your Tank or a companions pet starts hacking
into your group you'll wish you had Cancel magic...Charm sucks... Funniest
thing was seeing our Magician running after we killed the eye and it took us
a sec to catch on that his Pet was smacking away at him.... In between
Spells and ROFL we had to kill his pet cause I didn't have Cancel memorized
at that time...Came in handy tho when the Next Evil Eye charmed one of the
Rangers....

Why is it everyone has problems with getting cash? Through normal
adventuring I, at level 13, have just over 70pp more than enuff to buy my
5th rank spells and some of the 6th rank spells.... What's everyone doing
for cash?

Cinius Shade(Mith Marr)
